summary: Test suite that uses Moto and boto3 to simulate AWS Kinesis Video Archived Media services, verifying client operations such as video clip retrieval and generation of DASH/HLS streaming session URLs, and confirming that a mock server can be launched and accessed during tests.
business_intent: Validate the correctness of Kinesis Video Archived Media client functionality and the reliability of a mock server setup in a controlled test environment, enabling developers to detect integration issues without accessing real AWS resources.
